member.name: M:MR.Gestures.WinPhone.Renderers.DependencyObjectExtensions.FindChild``1(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.String)
member.summary: Find any child of type T and Name childname. Searches down the tree first and then the siblings.

member.name: M:MR.Gestures.WinPhone.Renderers.DependencyObjectExtensions.FindAllChildren``1(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds all children of type T.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.WinPhone.Settings.LicenseKey
member.summary: Set the LicenseKey to the key you got when you purchased a license for this app. The license key varies with the app name.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.WinPhone.Settings.MsUntilTapped
member.summary: Milliseconds after a Tapping event that will be waited until Tapped is raised. If a second Tapping comes within this timeframe, then DoubleTapped will be raised instead. If more than two taps come with less then this timeframe between them, neither Tapped nor DoubleTapped will be raised. It will only be indicated in TapEventArgs.NumberOfTaps in the Tapping event.

member.name: M:MR.Gestures.WinPhone.WinPhoneGestureHandler.onManipulationDelta(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.ManipulationDeltaEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the ManipulationDelta event. Recognizes various gestures and calls the appropriate methods. This method comes more or less from https://phone.codeplex.com/SourceControl/latest#PhoneToolkitSample8/Samples/GestureSample.xaml.cs
